item.title: The Civilisation of Sarvara
item.description: Overview Sarvara was a Morellic city and Bronze-Age civilisation located on the river Sarav, after which it was named, the language of which was Classical Sarvaran, a Southern Morellic language.

item.title: The Sun Grows Dark
item.description: Sarvaran Text Eyúdhran ikűmma lisi̋nnanis cádra kelh ankéiranith liką́rh musápra. Oműnith íkų̈ lówerith ánïtirh éyïrath, kelh eyán ástïrilh lísï eyápąrath.
